description: Flicktapular Free is a fun game where you tap and flick different shapes to earn points. As you progress through the 3 different demo levels, the game speeds up, and you must earn more points to pass each level.  Flicktapular Free tracks your overall statistics so you can see how many times you've tapped and flicked! Whether you want to casually kill a few minutes while waiting in line, or you want to competitively play for 30 minutes to earn those extra few points, Flicktapular Free is the game for you!  Download the full version of Flicktapular for 10 levels, global high scores, achievements, and more!
